¶ He spake <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%>; A certain <S%G5100><s%> man had <S%G2192><s%> a fig tree <S%G4808><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> vineyard <S%G290><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> and sought <S%G2212><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> thereon <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> .

¶ And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, there was <S%G2258><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of infirmity <S%G769><s%> eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> bowed together <S%G4794><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> wise <S%G3838><s%> lift up <S%G352><s%> herself.

And <S%G1161><s%> the ruler of the synagogue <S%G752><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> with indignation <S%G23><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had healed <S%G2323><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day, and said <S%G3004><s%> unto the people <S%G3793><s%>, There are <S%G1526><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> men ought <S%G1163><s%> to work <S%G2038><s%>: in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G5025><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and be healed <S%G2323><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this woman <S%G5026><s%> , being <S%G5607><s%> a daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%> , whom <S%G3739><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> hath bound <S%G1210><s%> , lo <S%G2400><s%> , these eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> , be loosed <S%G3089><s%> from <S%G575><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> bond <S%G1199><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> ?

¶ Then <S%G1161><s%> said he <S%G3004><s%>, Unto what <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> ? and <S%G2532><s%> whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I resemble <S%G3666><s%> it <S%G846><s%> ?

¶ Strive <S%G75><s%> to enter in <S%G1525><s%> at <S%G1223><s%> the strait <S%G4728><s%> gate <S%G4439><s%> : for <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> , I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , will seek <S%G2212><s%> to enter in <S%G1525><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shall <S%G2480><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be able <S%G2480><s%> .

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall ye begin <S%G756><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> , We have eaten <S%G5315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drunk <S%G4095><s%> in thy <S%G4675><s%> presence <S%G1799><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> thou hast taught <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> streets <S%G4113><s%> .

¶ The same <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> there came <S%G4334><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Get thee out <S%G1831><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> depart <S%G4198><s%> hence <S%G1782><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>.
